class.name: Mavo
class.description: `Mavo` is the main class. Every Mavo app is an instance of `Mavo` and `mavo.js` is the entry point of Mavo itself.

member.name: treeBuilt
member.description: Promise that resolves when the Mavo tree has been built.

member.name: element
member.description: The Mavo root element. Same element that was passed in to the constructor.
